tasks.task: Operating a farmer's hoe in a field
subtasks: Hold hoe in dominant hand
Grip the hoe handle firmly
Position body close to the ground
Kneel down on one knee for stability
Lean forward slightly to reach the soil
Rock the hoe blade back and forth against the soil
Apply downward pressure to cut into the soil
Continue hoeing in a sweeping motion across the field
Adjust the angle of the hoe as needed
Bend down at the waist to access the soil
Insert fingertip into the soil surface lightly
Feel the texture and dampness of the soil
Estimate moisture level compared to ideal conditions
Repeat in several spots to check for uniformity

tasks.task: Walking in a straight line through a field
subtasks: Hold hands firmly at sides
Lift one foot and step forward
Transfer weight to front foot
Bring other foot forward to join
Repeat until reaching the end of the field

tasks.task: Operating a cultivator attachment on a tractor
subtasks: Sit in the tractor seat, adjusting for comfort
Toggle cultivator controls to engage the gears
Guide the tractor in a straight line over the field
Monitor ground speed to ensure proper coverage
Adjust appliers width or depth as needed

tasks.task: Applying liquid fertilizer through a center pivot system
subtasks: Access the pivot point and attach applicator
Start the pivot system and adjust flow rate
Monitor coverage to ensure even distribution
Check nozzles for clogs and clean if necessary
Walk behind the moving system to visually inspect application
